title: Between the Scenes - The Parkland Survivors Want to See the Manager
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - The Parkland Survivors Want to See the Manager
description:
Trevor applauds the Parkland survivors for refusing to take no as an answer. Listen to Trevor interact with the audience when The Daily Show cuts to commercial.
